help-file.title: "SONG OF THE NIGHT"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Room Aggressive: No Cumulative: N/A Duration: Instantaneous Type of song: Generic
"Song of the Night" is sung in a very chaotic fashion, causing those not in the piper's group to become confused and distracted. This can cause a number of things to happen, such as forcing those not in the bard's group out of the room in various ways either by fleeing or random teleportation. A small amount of damage is also bestowed upon those not grouped.
